conversation.message: We have long admired the program at Nursery_D. It aligns perfectly with our family values and educational goals. We are applying now and hope to secure a spot immediately.

* Parent_A -> Nursery_B (Rank 1 for A)

Since Nursery_D is my Rank 1 choice, and I am the highest priority parent remaining (4th overall) who prefers Nursery_D highly (Rank 1), applying immediately gives me the best chance of securing my preferred outcome based on the deferred acceptance logic embedded in this negotiation structure.
